desc: Create Energy out of Entropy Become part of a New Evolution in Waste Management. After Natures Principle Organic Trash is converterted to Valuable Nutrients decentralised at the Place its Produced. To Reach sustainable zero waste lifestyle and becoming greenhouse gas positive and fighting deforestation and overfishing

layout.text: There's a smarter way to use Waste
Mother nature and technology united to exploit all biological material.
Making the recycling of glas, paper, metal and packaging painless
